item.Name: Is Motion Tracked (By Enemies) When Active
One-Shot Activation Effect#Effect kills itself rather than being explicitly killed when the ability deactivates
Can be activated when weapon state is relaxed
Does Not Appear In Extended Motion Tracker Range

_field_real_fraction.name: activation energy cost#amount of energy required to activate the ability

_field_real.name: active energy consumption:energy/second#amount of energy consumed continuously while the ability is active

_field_tag_reference_64.name: activation effect#effects triggered when player activates ability

item.Name: Toggle stabilizer off if activated with ADS active
Auto activate only if already in the air

_field_real.name: minimum height above floor#set to negative value to disable as 0 is used in the tag post-process to set a default
activation deceleration:[0.01,+inf] wu/s per sec#Rate at which the player decelerates after activating the stabilizer
stall duration:[0.01,+inf] seconds#Duration that the player remains completely stalled in mid air before starting to fall again
time limit:seconds#Max time Stabilizer can remain active for a single burst. Set to 0.0 if you want infinite.

_field_custom.name: malleable time limit::seconds#Max time stabilizer can remain active for a single burst. Set to 0.0 if you want infinite. Ensure that the activation effect can persist for this duration.

_field_struct.name: malleable time limit::seconds#Max time stabilizer can remain active for a single burst. Set to 0.0 if you want infinite. Ensure that the activation effect can persist for this duration.

item.Name: sequential#applies the percentages one after another on the base
total percentage#adds up all of the percentages and applies them to the base
addition#adds on all of the modifiers to the base
product#multiplies the values one after another on to the base

_field_real.name: cooldown:seconds#How much time must pass after deactivation before you can activate again.
time scale#Time scale applied to velocity after stall duration

_field_custom.name: malleable time scale#Time scale applied to velocity after stall duration

_field_struct.name: malleable time scale#Time scale applied to velocity after stall duration

item.Name: sequential#applies the percentages one after another on the base
total percentage#adds up all of the percentages and applies them to the base
addition#adds on all of the modifiers to the base
product#multiplies the values one after another on to the base

_field_real.name: max horizontal speed:wu/s [0,+inf]#max horizontal speed while stabilizer is active

_field_struct.name: vertical speed boost at exit:wu/s#adds this on to the player vertical velocity, based on normalized time spent stabilizing
